CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 29, 1962, pg. 9 reads: "Kent Party Guests - Dressed in fashionable fall attire, this group of socialites enjoyed the luncheon-bridge party given by Cleveland's Mrs. Louise Kent, in a private suite at the Pittsburgh Hilton Hotel last Saturday. Included are Mmes. Billie Brown, Etta Hawkins, Ruth King, Mrs. Kent, the hostess; Wini Houston, Toki Schalk Johnson, Ruth Wright, Winnie Nickens, Lucille Cuthbert, Jayne McDaniel, Ethel Ramos Harris, Marge Harris, Gladys Harris, Peggy Oweido, Florence Byrd Duke and Hazel Garland (back to camera). - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including Wilhelmina Byrd Brown wearing pearl necklace, Etta Hawkins, Ruth King, Louise Kent, hostess; Winnie Houston, seated in back; Toki Schalk Johnson, leaning on hand; Ruth Wright, Winnie Nickens, seated on left at front table; Lucille Cuthbert, Jayne McDaniel, Ethel Ramos Harris, wearing jacket with fur collar; Marge Harris, wearing fur hat; Gladys Harris, Peggy Oweido, Florence Byrd Duke, and Hazel Garland, back facing; seated around card tables for bridge luncheon in Hilton Hotel
